node.name: Vortex Razor HD LH 3-15x42 HSR4 Rifle Scope
node.short_description: The Vortex Razor HD LH 3-15×42 HSR4 proves that hardcore hunters don’t need to be stuck with complex, heavy, feature-ridden and competition-focused tactical riflescopes.
node.description:
The Vortex Razor HD LH 3-15x42 HSR4 proves that hardcore hunters don’t need to be stuck with complex, heavy, feature-ridden and competition-focused tactical riflescopes in order to get the best possible optical quality for their hunt.

Listening to the requests of extreme, lightweight mountain hunters, these scopes bring it back to basics with 1inch tubes and low-capped turrets. These features are combined with the incredible optical performance of our highest-end Razor series of riflescopes. Everything you need to be successful in even the harshest, most remote conditions and nothing you don’t.

When it comes to the hunt of a lifetime, put a Razor HD LH on your rifle.

 

Vortex Razor HD LH 3-15x42 HSR4 Specifications:

Magnification 3-15x
Objective Lens Diameter 42 mm
Eye Relief 3.8 inches
Field of View 35.8-7.1 ft/100 yds
Tube Size 1 inch
Turret Style Capped
Adjustment Graduation 1/4 MOA
Travel Per Rotation 15 MOA
Max Elevation Adjustment 55 MOA
Max Windage Adjustment 55 MOA
Parallax Setting 20 to infinity
Length 13.5 inches
Weight 16.5 oz

node.name: Vortex Strike Eagle 1-6x24 Rifle Scope
node.short_description: The Vortex Strike Eagle 1-6×24 Rifle Scope provides rock-solid build-quality to ensure accurate, reliable, and repeatable performance – every time you squeeze the trigger.
node.description:
The Vortex Strike Eagle 1-6x24 Rifle Scope provides rock-solid build-quality to ensure accurate, reliable, and repeatable performance - every time you squeeze the trigger.

Executing technical, short, and long-range shots requires a rifle scope with application-specific features and the Strike Eagle Riflescopes boast those features in a trim, lightweight and durable package.

High-quality, fully multi-coated lenses deliver a crisp, clear sight image and optimal low-light performance.

 

Vortex Strike Eagle 1-6x24 Specifications:

Magnification 1-6x
Objective Lens Diameter 24 mm
Eye Relief 3.5 inches
Field of View 116.5-19.2 ft/100 yds
Tube Size 30 mm
Turret Style Capped
Adjustment Graduation 1/2 MOA
Travel Per Rotation 44 MOA
Max Elevation Adjustment 140 MOA
Max Windage Adjustment 140 MOA
Parallax Setting 100 yards
Length 10.5 inches
Weight 1.1lb / 499gr

node.name: Vortex StrikeEagle 4-24X50 EBR-4 MOA Rifle Scope
node.short_description: The Vortex StrikeEagle 4-24×50 EBR-4 Rifle Scope allows for executing technical, short and long-range shots. An ideal choice for value-minded shooters who are looking for a riflescope to top their next rig.
node.description:
The Vortex StrikeEagle 4-24X50 EBR-4 MOA Rifle Scope allows for executing technical, short and long-range shots.

With application-specific features and top-notch build-quality, the StrikeEagle Rifle Scope ensures precise, dependable and repeatable performance every time you squeeze the trigger.

The Vortex Strike Eagle Riflescopes are a trim, lightweight and durable package making them the ideal choice for value-minded shooters who are looking for a riflescope to top their next rig.

 

 

Vortex StrikeEagle 4-24x50 EBR-4 Rifle Scope Features

XD™ Lens Elements Extra-low dispersion (XD) glass increases resolution and color fidelity, resulting in crisp, sharp images.
Fully Multi-Coated Proprietary coatings increase light transmission with multiple anti-reflective coatings on all air-to-glass surfaces.
Second Focal Plane Reticle Scale of reticle maintains the same ideally-sized appearance. Listed reticle subtensions used for estimating range, holdover and wind drift correction are accurate at the highest magnification.
Glass-Etched Reticle Allows for intricate reticle design. Protected between two layers of glass for optimum durability and reliability.
Illuminated Reticle Provides precise aiming under low-light conditions

 

Vortex StrikeEagle 4-24x50 EBR-4 Rifle Scope Specifications

Magnification 4-24x
Objective Lens Diameter 50 mm
Eye Relief 3.5 inches
Field of View 26.2-4.3 ft/100 yds
Tube Size 30 mm
Turret Style Tactical
Adjustment Graduation 1/4 MOA
Travel Per Rotation 12 MOA
Max Elevation Adjustment 80 MOA
Max Windage Adjustment 80 MOA
Parallax Setting 20 yards to infinity
Length 14.9 inches
Weight 25.6 oz

node.name: Vortex Viper HST 4-16x44 HST VMR1 Rifle Scope
node.short_description: Tree stands to mountain tops, bolt guns to ARs, the Viper HST is ideal for a wide range of shooting applications.
node.description:
Tree stands to mountain tops, bolt guns to ARs, the Viper HST is ideal for a wide range of shooting applications.

Blending many of the best features from Vortex's incredibly popular Viper PST and Viper HS riflescopes, the Viper HST riflescope is built on an ultra-strong 30mm, one-piece aluminium tube to deliver ample windage and elevation travel and optimal adjustment.

An advanced optical system, highlighted with a 4x zoom range, provides magnification versatility. A forgiving eye box with increased eye relief gets shooters on target quickly and easily.

Incredibly precise, repeatable and durable tactical turrets built specifically for dialling, along with its hashmark-based VMR-1 reticle, top off this highly versatile riflescope’s long-range performance features.

Vortex Viper HST 4-16x44 HST VMR1 Specifications:

Magnification 4-16x
Objective Lens Diameter 44 mm
Eye Relief 4.0 inches
Field of View 27.4-7.4 ft/100 yds
Tube Size 30 mm
Turret Style Tactical
Adjustment Graduation 1/4 MOA
Travel Per Rotation 12 MOA
Max Elevation Adjustment 75 MOA
Max Windage Adjustment 75 MOA
Parallax Setting 50 yards to infinity
Length 13.7 inches
Weight 20.8 oz

node.short_description: Tree stands to mountain tops, bolt guns to ARs, the Vortex Viper HST 6-24×50 is ideal for a wide range of shooting applications.

node.name: Yukon Photon RT 6x50S Night Vision Rifle Scope
node.short_description: The Yukon Photon RT 6x50S Night Vision Rifle Scope is one of the best budget night vision scopes available.
node.description:
The Yukon Photon RT 6x50S Night Vision Rifle Scope is one of the best budget night vision scopes available. Featuring high shock resistance, up to .375 calibre, the Photon Night Vision Scope is capable of handling high recoil firearms. Remote operation, viewing and live streaming are all available via your mobile phone with the Stream Vision App.

Yukon Photon RT 6x50S Night Vision Rifle Scope Features

High nighttime sensitivity
High magnification 6 / 12х
Integrated video recorder
IPX5 Water & dust protection
Quick-change power supply
Daytime operation possibility
Integrated invisible IR illuminator
Recording and live YouTube streaming
Integration with iOS and Android devices
User selectable reticles: 6 shapes, 4 colours
Remote review and operation using smartphone
Mounting on firearm with standard 30 mm rings
Shock resistant for heavy calibers: 12 gauge, 9.3x64, .375H&H

node.name: Yukon Ranger Pro 5x42 Night Vision Binoculars
node.short_description: The Ranger Pro 5×42 digital night vision binoculars feature a more sensitive CCD coupled with advanced SumLight technology that gives an increased viewing range of up to 500m and a sharper image.
node.description:
The Yukon Ranger Pro 5x42 Night Vision Binoculars feature a more sensitive CCD coupled with advanced SumLight technology that gives an increased viewing range of up to 500m and a sharper image.

The Yukon Ranger series pioneered digital night vision and its renowned performance and reliability have made them bestsellers. The combination of digital technology and high magnification provides flexibility and extended viewing ranges.

Maximum viewing range: 500m
Digital night vision
Comes with case & neck Strap
In-built tripod mount
Gen: Digital (high sensitivity CCD sensor array)
Sum Light software technology
Black rubberised bodyshell
Video out socket
Variable brightness/contrast control
LED "on" & "low battery" indicators
Built-in low output & high output IR illuminators
